item.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in North Carolina.

item.title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in North Carolina.
To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in North Carolina.

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: By Mr. McINTYRE:H.R. 2294.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:Article I, Section 8, Amendment XVI, of the United StatesConstitution.[Page H3252]

item.name: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs Subcommittee

item.text:
Directs the Secretary of the Interior to revise the Coastal Barrier Resources System maps relating to the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in North Carolina to remove the following properties from such system:

  • Lot Number 3, Waters Edge in Hampstead, NC 28443;
  • 182 S Beach Road, Wilmington, NC 28405;
  • 311 Windchase Lane, Wilmington, NC 28409; and
  • 225 Chimney Lane Wilmington, NC 28411.
item.name: Introduced in House

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
